1570490.name: Perikoto
1570490.description:
The lighthouse's bright rays pierce through the foggy sea and the dense woods, beckoning you. Restless crows peck at the roots of the trees, disturbing what's within. As you land on the frozen beach, you realize how far from home you are.

Features

  • Experience an immersive, tension-filled trek through deep snow and multiple locations.

  • Plan your route carefully, or accidentally lure the thing of the woods.

  • Explore the woods to solve the secret of the lighthouse.

  • Use various tools to make your way through challenging terrain.

  • Remember, do not scare the birds.

  • If you feel it approaching, hide.

This cold land is calling for you…
